item.description:
The location has over 400 pieces to choose fromv and once you have made your selection you can paint it anyway you like. They will take care of the glazing and firing and your piece will be ready in one week to pick up. They have 60 colors, brushes, stencils, stamps and a computer with over 25,000 images to download and trace on to the pieces.


Pricing: Since that night is Ladies' Night we are getting 50% off studio cost, so that means it will be $6 per person and the piece that you select to paint: $10 - $100 depending on the piece you choose.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet me infront of the place!
item.name: Pottery Painting = Ladies Night!
